page.title: 04PEOPLE AND THE AREA
page.content: BEFORE YOU CAN FISH IN THE WITHAM YOU HAVE TO OBTAIN A LICENCE FROM THE RIVER BOARD THE MONEY FROM THIS GOES TOWARDS THE UP KEEP OF THE RIVER. THE ONLY MEETING PLACE AS SUCH IN BROTHERTOFT IS THE CHURCH HALL GRID REFERENCE 27,47.THIS USED TO BE THE VILLAGE CHURCH BUT NOW ALL THE COMMUNITY IS ABLE TO MAKE USE OF IT IN SUCH WAY'S AS MEETING'S,BINGO,KEEP FIT,JUMBLE SALE'S,TABLE TENNIS AND RECEPTION'S FOR WEDDING'S.THERE IS AN OLD SCHOOL IN GRID REFERENCE 26,46 WHICH HAS BEEN BROUGHT BY THE SCOUTING ASSOCIATION WITH THE LAND AROUND IT,TO BE USED BY ALL THE CUBS AND SCOUTS IN THE BOSTON AND DISTRICT FOR CAMPING AND ENTERTAINMENT.A 40 FOOT SCALFFOLD HAS BEEN ERRECTED BY THE 3rd FISHTOFT VENTURE SCOUTS AS A TRAINING AREA FOR CLIMBING.THIS TOWER CAN BE SEEN FROM ALL ROUND THE AREA.
